name: audacity
description: Audacity is an easy-to-use, multi-track audio editor and recorder for Windows, macOS, GNU/Linux and other operating systems. Audacity is free, open source software.

name: slippi-launcher
description: The Slippi Launcher is the hub for everything Slippi. It downloads and auto-updates Slippi Dolphin along with providing access to news, replays, mirroring, broadcasting, and more.

name: appimaged
description: appimaged is an optional daemon that watches locations like ~/bin and ~/Downloads for AppImages and if it detects some, registers them with the system, so that they show up in the menu, have their icons show up, MIME types associated, etc.

name: lmms
description: A Free & Open Source Software To Help Make Music

name: project-plus-launcher
description: Project+ is a community driven patch for Project M, a game modification for Super Smash Bros. Brawl

name: blender
description: Blender is a FOSS 3D modeling an animation application.

name: nextcloud
description: Online collaboration solution

name: android-studio
description: Android Studio is the official integrated development environment for Google's Android operating system, built on JetBrains' IntelliJ IDEA software and designed specifically for Android development.

name: discord
description: All-in-one voice and text chat for gamers that's free, secure, and works on both your desktop and phone.

name: musescore
description: Create, playback, and print sheet music for free. MuseScore is cross-platform, multi-lingual, open source music notation software.

name: zoom
description: Zoom Video Conference

name: libreoffice-fresh-basic
description: The office productivity suite compatible to the open and standardized ODF document format. Supported by The Document Foundation.

name: firefox
description: Browse the World Wide Web

name: cura
description: Ultimaker Cura is a slicer, an application that prepares your model for 3D printing.

name: fontforge
description: FontForge is a font editor for outline and bitmap fonts that lets you create, edit, or convert, a range of fonts, including PostScript, TrueType, OpenType, cid-keyed, multi-master, cff, SVG and BitMap (bdf, FON, NFNT) fonts.

name: kdenlive
description: Kdenlive is a non linear video editor.

name: spotify
description: Spotify is a music streaming service. Requires libcurl-gnutls.so.4. May have to create a soft link to libcurl.so.4.

name: gimp
description: Create images and edit photographs.

name: inkscape
description: A Free and open source vector graphics editor.

name: freecad
description: FreeCAD is a parametric 3D modeler.

name: appimage-update
description: AppImageUpdate updates AppImages based on the update information embedded in AppImages.

name: pkg2appimage
description: Generate AppImages from existing binary packages.

name: appimagetool
description: Build AppImages.
